column5: Enjoy breathtaking views of the pristine waters from South Padre relaxing in our comfortable abode. Ample open concept living with large wall to wall windows welcome you. Fully equipped kitchen with plenty of counter space to prep meals and feel at home. Sizable bedrooms with large bathrooms. Large closet space. Relax in the balcony with your favorite beverage indulging in the warm island sun or enjoy the many amenities. Beautiful pools & tennis courts. Private gated complex. Book me today!
column8: Breathtaking Views in Relaxing Ample Beachfront...
